name: k-golf-print-server
description: K-Golf thermal printer service for Windows

scripts.build:exe: npm run build && pkg dist/server.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output release/k-golf-printer.exe
scripts.build:macos: npm run build && pkg dist/server.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output release/k-golf-printer
scripts.build:all: npm run build && pkg dist/server.js --targets node18-win-x64,node18-macos-x64 --output release/k-golf-printer
